title: “Built up area” means the area covered by a building on all floors including (2) (---) Mezzanine floor, if any, but excepting the areas excluded specifically from F
clause_text: “Built up area” means the area covered by a building on all floors including (2) (---) Mezzanine floor, if any, but excepting the areas excluded specifically from F.S.I. under the said Regulation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: “Built up area” means the area covered by a building on all floors including (2) (---) Mezzanine floor, if any, but excepting the areas excluded specifically from F.S.I. under the said Regulation.
